title: New to Upwork? Join Us Now.. Long Term Projects
snippet:
Hello Candidates,

We have multiple opening for the following:
1. Seo & Link Building
2. Content Writing
3. Classified Ads Posting
4. Marketing & Sales
5. Social Media Promotion(Facebook & Google Plus)
6. SEO keyword research
7. Bulk Contact Data providers
8. Affiliate Marketing


Choose what you are good at and apply for one or more positions and a brief on how you will handle it.

Note: This job is for low rate contractors only.
